name: Bundeena Garden Studio near beaches
summary: Light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Located in Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach. Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook. Please note that current construction work on an adjacent block may cause some noise on week days 7am-5pm. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or more.
space: Private and completely self-contained space, with queen bed, kitchen and shower room, ideal for a self-catering couple. Sorry - because of unfenced areas and wildlife it is not suitable for children or pets. Please note that there is a 2 night minimum stay, 3 night minimum on long weekends. Check costs by entering your intended dates, as seasonal rates apply.
description: Light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Located in Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach. Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook. Please note that current construction work on an adjacent block may cause some noise on week days 7am-5pm. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or more. Private and completely self-contained space, with queen bed, kitchen and shower room, ideal for a self-catering couple. Sorry - because of unfenced areas and wildlife it is not suitable for children or pets. Please note that there is a 2 night minimum stay, 3 night minimum on long weekends. Check costs by entering your intended dates, as seasonal rates apply. Guests have their own access through the garden. Studio facilities include TV/DVD, ipod dock, CD player/radio and basic wireless internet. There are books, CDs, DVDs and
neighborhood_overview: Bundeena is a unique village completely enclosed by national park and four beautiful beaches, yet still within the Sydney metropolitan area and only an hour away from city restaurants, galleries and concerts. In Bundeena you will find: - Unspoilt beaches, with the opportunity to swim, kayak, snorkel or go fishing. - Walking access to the famous Coast Walk (Wedding Cake Rock, Marley Beach, Wattamolla) and short drive to other Royal National Park bushwalks. - Cafes, restaurants: there are cafes open for breakfast and/or lunch on most days, and a few options to eat out at night. The Community and Services Club is open for lunch and dinner every day, and has great views over Port Hacking. At 'The Bowlo' there is a bistro with Asian/Australian meals. Driftwood Cafe also has evening dining on Wed-Sat evenings. The IGA is great for picnic/self-catering provisions, with fresh bread, hot chooks and a good selection of beer and wine in addition to all of the basics. - Talented artists who open t
notes: Minimal kitchen supplies (eg tea/coffee/milk/sugar/condiments) are provided, please bring other supplies. The local IGA is a few minutes walk away (near the ferry wharf) and is open 8am to 8pm every day for groceries, fruit and veg and liquor.
transit: The drive to/from the city of Sydney is around 60-80 minutes depending on traffic. There is a ferry to/from Cronulla ever hour until 7pm in the summer, until 6pm in the winter. From Cronulla you can get a train to the city - total trip around 90-120 minutes depending on connections. If arriving from the airport, take the train to Cronulla and then ferry to Bundeena, but car is easier and quicker. Bundeena is easy to walk around, everything is within walking distance. Note - there is no bus service or taxi service. You can also do tours of Port Hacking by ferry. Search on 'cronulla ferries' for Ferry information.
access: Guests have their own access through the garden. Studio facilities include TV/DVD, ipod dock, CD player/radio and basic wireless internet. There are books, CDs, DVDs and board games for your entertainment. Linen and towels are included (but byo beach towels). The shady deck overlooks the garden, and there is a small private courtyard with gas BBQ.
interaction: We live in the main house on the same property but guests have their own access through the garden and do not need to interact, however we are available to answer any questions.
house_rules: House rules for Bundeena Garden Studio: Please read this carefully before your visit so you know what to expect. If you need anything at all or have any other questions, please don't be afraid to ask – we want to make sure you enjoy your visit ☺  • CHECK IN/OUT  Please advise of your time of arrival by text message or email. Check in is usually after 2pm, check out is normally before 12pm (noon), but these can be negotiated if there are not adjacent bookings. • KEY You can pick up the key from us in the main house, or will be advised where to pick up if we are not at home. Ensure when you leave the studio that the doors are locked. • YOUR ROOM Sheets are changed for each visitor, but not the bedcover and cushion covers, so please keep them clean. The room is not serviced during your stay, so please hang towels for re-use. • FACILITIES A broom is provided – a mop and vacuum cleaner available on request. There is a clothes airer in the kitchen, and also retractable washing line under the

host.host_about: I have lived with my husband Chris in Bundeena for 28 years, bringing up our two sons who have now left home. We are artists and educators. We love photography, music, food, movies and travel, and believe you are never too old for the next adventure.

reviews.comments: Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.

Bundeena is beautiful. The perfect spot for an easy weekend away from the constant noise of the city. And Belinda and Chris' Garden cottage is a fantastic place to spend time. Stones throw from the beach and beautiful coastal walks, but completely private in a little garden oasis. Birds everywhere. The cottage is fitted out beautifully, with thoughtfulness and great taste. We would love to return. And next time we're hoping for better luck spotting whales!

Bundeena and Royal National Park is a wonderful getaway from Sydney. Belinda and Chris' garden studio is separate from the house. Staying there was perfect -  It was cosy and inviting, well-equipped and had everything we needed. The porch overlooking the garden was peaceful while having a morning coffee, birds chirping... We walked along Jibbon's Beach the first day, and then to Marley Beach the second day - sighting migrating whales along the way! Very ideal for exploring Royal National Park, and a short walking distance from the ferry. Belinda was a wonderful host, friendly and available whenever needed. Thanks for having us!

Belinda and Chris are lovely people and very welcoming hosts. They were friendly, prompt in their communications, and provided us with a warm, quiet and cosy space for a winter getaway. Their studio is private, very well decked out, and closely situated to the beaches and bushwalks in Bundeena. Thanks for the wonderful weekend away :)

Belinda was vibrant and welcoming. The studio is lovely, private and decked out with everything you need for a cosy weekend away - there was even a fire pit which Belinda generously allowed us to use. The location is gorgeous, Bundeena is so relaxing, I didn't want to leave!

The Bundeena garden studio was a delight to stay at. Beautifully renovated, it is light and spacious. It has a very comfy bed in a peaceful environment. A lovely place to wake up to. 
Belinda is lovely and friendly and made the stay easy and comfortable.
An easy place to holiday and one we will be recommending to our Bundeena-bound friends!
I look forward to returning one day soon.

We loved our stay at Bundeena! Belinda's cottage was beautifully presented with quality comforts, privacy and has all the amenities you could need; perfect for a couple's getaway. The location is ideal just a short stroll to the beautiful beaches, bushwalking and dining. We fell in love with the area and look forward to returning there many times. Thank you for having us, we had a wonderful weekend!

Hi All, for those wanting a hideaway with the options of city experience if needed, then a cosy bungalow in Bundeena is a must. It was a lovely warm space with the fresh air or Bundeena and modern facilities. The kitchenette and bathroom were easy to use and made my life so easy. With private access it leaves you free to enjoy the environs on your own terms. The beach is a stones through away. I would love to have stayed longer. It is a quiet refreshing space in which to contemplate. A ferry ride to Cronulla is available if one needs to re-quaint once self with urban life, with the addition of train to CBD if needed. I highly recommend for those who have the time to relax and enjoy. Cheers, Brendan.

We've stayed at a few AirBNB places now and this has been the best so far. Everything was as promised and more. The cabin is a renovated artist's studio at the back of the garden, secluded and private behind trees. Belinda, the host, was lovely and welcoming and gave us some advice for how to best take advantage of the natural surrounds and events that were on in town.

The amenities were clean and exactly like the photos. We were impressed with the host's taste in DVDs and books provided for our use. 

We caught the ferry to Cronulla for the day ($12.60 return for an adult, must have cash to pay on the boat - a bit steep but worth it) and had a wonderful time enjoying the spring fair.

All in all, the host's made our stay extremely comfortable and gave us the privacy we needed to fully enjoy our stay.

Thank you Belinda and Chris!

Hi Belinda, I'd like to thank you allowing us to stay in your beautiful studio. It had all the necessities and was in an amazing location near the beach. Just perfect for our little weekend away! Your artwork is very fascinating as well, I will get in touch with you about those shortly :) thanks again and hopefully we will come back again in the future!

We had a fantastic weekend staying at Belinda's studio. The location is perfect, a short stroll to the beaches, bushwalks and the local shops. Ideal setting in the back of her garden and all the privacy you could want! We wouldn't hesitate to come back again!

We had a fantastic stay. The property is lovely, has everything you need. It was very clean and tidy. Very close to the beach, great walks. Incredibly peaceful. We liked it so much we stayed an extra night. 

Belinda was accommodating and a pleasure to rent from.  

I would recommend it to any friend.

My husband and I just had a perfect weekend in Bundeena.  This garden studio is everything it claims to be - Belinda has very thoughtfully set up this private sanctuary for 2 - it is very charming.   We will definitely come back.
We had a very pleasant short stay in Bundeena.  The accommodation was clean, comfortable and close to the beach and village amenities.  We would happily come back, but next time stay for longer.

We had such a fantastic weekend at Belinda’s gorgeous studio. Its just as lovely as in the photos – clean and beautiful and bright and airy and everything there that you could possibly need (even salt and pepper and pasta and tuna…AND scented candles). The place had a lovely vibe and even the bed and the pillows were comfy – and we have a Tempur at home so I’m very picky with beds!  Oh and the artwork is awesome!

The garden is lovely too and it’s a short walk to the end of the street to the beach and the national park. The beach is GORGEOUS!! Crystal clear, calm water and pretty seashells. Its also nice and protected so you don’t get blown away or sandblasted which happens on some other beaches.  Just past the beach is a path to the national park, which is so pretty. There were lots of birds and trees and beautiful giant rocks and some Aboriginal carvings. 

It bucketed rain most of the weekend we were there but we still had a lovely weekend. We’ve already booked our return visit for next month. :-) Thanks Belinda!

This apartment is a lovely place to stay, it's comfortable, clean and has everything you need for a stay in Bundeena, or even if you want to visit Sydney but don't just want to see city life! We would definitely recommend staying here and would love to stay again when we're back in the Sydney area.

We stayed in Belinda's garden studio for three days last week, and found it to be exactly as advertised. Very private and comfortable.  The location is really good, being so close to the beach. Overall the experience was very pleasant indeed and reasonably priced.  Lee

Belinda was great to deal with - she was organised, communicated well and best of all provided a perfect retreat! Her granny flat/studio has plenty of space, love and comfort and is perfectly positioned within walking distance to all the attractions!

We were very pleased with our accommodation and hosts Belinda and Chris. They have accessed what their guests needs may be then thoughtfully provided  everything down to an umbrella I noticed on the verandah. Everything was clean and fresh no tired old cast offs of any kind. We would recommend this BnB highly.

You can't really beat Belinda's place in terms of location and experience. I had a friend visiting from overseas and we had a lovely time in this little laid back beach town. Belinda's place is a cute little place where you can hear the birds sing in the morning and the waves crashing on the shores as you sleep. 

Just lovely and I couldn't be more happy to recommend it to anyone looking to get out of Sydney for a few days!

Great stay- beautiful, clean, modern apartment. It's a very peaceful location and it is a short walk to three beaches- two of which are literally on your doorstep. Belinda was super helpful and friendly- would definitely recommend / stay again. It was exactly what we wanted- a chilled out stay in / just next to the Royal National Park.

Belinda was friendly and helpful and easy to communicate with, and the studio is beautiful and looks just as it does in the pictures. It is very clean, private and well equipped. And it's only a few minutes to the beach. We had a great time and would be very happy to stay again!

Thankyou Chris and Belinda. 
Sorry we didn't get to meet you on the weekend Belinda but your correspondence and contact regarding our stay was fantastic.
Lovely meeting Chris who settled us into your beautiful studio. It iimmediately felt like a home away from home.   It was clean, bright , private and peaceful. All the little extras like plunger coffee and CD player, to name a few were very thoughtful and appreciated. 
We had a beautiful stay and loved our walks, in between rain showers. Would love to go back again one day if we are ever in the area. 
The price for the studio was incredibly cheap for what you get. Thankyou for making it affordable to enjoy a weekend away without breaking the budget .
Kate and Darrel
Thank you Belinda. Your studio was perfect. What a wonderful weekend!   We had every creature comfort and the location is close to everything yet felt so secluded. We will be back! :)

The Bundeena Garden Studio was a delight to stay in. The place was spotless and had everything we needed for our 3 day getaway.  We were able to cook some meals, as well as eat out on two occasions. The studio is a minute from beautiful beaches and from the Royal National Park walks. Belinda was very welcoming while also leaving us to do our own thing.

Belinda was a great host and her studio was perfect for a couple's weekend getaway. Belinda was very quick to respond to all my queries before I arrived, and also have clear instructions to arrive. The studio itself is so nice, quaint, secluded and surrounded by nature. It's sits inter back yard of the main house but we were not disturbed at all. All the final touches were included in the studio and there was a really nice designer yet homely feel to the place. The bed was so comfortable :)A very short walk to the water too. Highly recommended :)

Belinda was quick to respond and very accommodating during our stay at her garden studio. The garden studio itself was much larger than we expected, well-furnished, well-equipped and immaculate. Location-wise, Bundeena is a relatively close to the city but is a charming suburb that feels like something more akin to a 2-3 hour drive from Sydney. We had a great time :)

Belinda has an absolutely amazing place in Bundeena. It was extremely clean, bright and beautifully decorated. Exactly as advertised. Belinda was the perfect host, picking us up from the ferry, providing all of the essentials and also leaving tourist brochures for all of the incredible walks in the area. The place is really well located, a short 5 minute stroll to the shops and a few minutes down to Jibbon beach, which really is lovely. We even managed a swim in July! Thanks Belinda, we had a really relaxing and pleasant stay. I would thoroughly recommend Bundeena and Belinda's place to others in the AirBnB community.
It's great to stay again in this garden studio. Belinda and Chris have kept this place at the highest standards.  We can't wait to be back.

Perfect for a weekend in the Royal National Park! The studio is 100m from a private beach, close to the ferry and has everything you need for a few nights away from home. 

Belinda and Chris were lovely hosts - they were very helpful and offered us good local food and whale watching tips.
Great accommodation.  We felt very welcome.  The garden studio was very clean and comfortable - perfect for our stay.  The location is great for visiting the Royal National Park.
This accommodation was really nice. It was a good size, clean and had lots of natural light. We were also impressed with how well equipped the kichen was. Belinda was very welcoming.
The studio was lovely and clean with comfortable bedding. The location was perfect for enjoying the national park and beaches. The host was helpful and friendly and gave us good local information.
We had a lovely time! Belinda was warm and welcoming. The studio was very clean and quiet, and we enjoyed the peacefulness. It was jut what we needed. We hope to be back soon!

Had a wonderful few days in a comfortable, clean and refreshing environment.  As I was travelling on my own I  appreciated the pickup and drop off for the ferry.  Hope to get back one day with my husband, as was our original plan.
Belinda has created a lovely, private studio that has everything we needed and provided a sanctuary at the end of the garden. It is well located close to beaches and the village and very comfortable.

We checked in for 2 nights stay at Belinda's Cabin and had the most relaxing time. The beaches are within close walking distance and the RSL Club is just a few hundred metres away. The Cabin was extremely clean and comfortable, adequately equipped kitchen and well stocked with books, dvd’s and multimedia equipment for a good quiet weekend and high degree of privacy. A true hidden gem indeed and would definitely recommend for those looking for a quiet and relaxing getaway.

Belinda was very welcoming, she showed us around the property and answered all our questions.

The property is as described on the listing. It was very clean and tidy, and beautifully secluded in a leafy garden. The studio had all appliances necessary for a short or long stay.

Bundeena is beautiful and quite. The location of the property was perfect, a short walking distance from two beaches and the main village (where you have the main shops, cafe and where you can catch a ferry to Cronulla).

The studio is perfect for some relaxing time. It was comfortable, clean and had everything we needed for 6 days. It's very very close from the beach (walking distance) and in a very quiet neighourhood. You can either cook home or go out. 
Belinda and her husband were very helpful and welcoming. I strongly recommend to stay here

Belinda was a wonderful host - quick to respond to enquiries and warm and friendly on arrival. The studio is beautiful exactly as shown in the photos. 
Tip - Be sure to read stove instructions before consuming wine. 
Bundeena is lovely. We enjoyed some short bush walks and lazed about the studio reading the paper. Perfect.

A perfect location! Two beaches are a mere couple of minutes walk away. We also did a great walk in the National Park which started just down the road from Belinda's. The studio is extremely clean and the kitchen is excellently stocked with everything you're likely to want and need. There is a great BBQ as well. The studio is separated from the main house by a lovely garden, and feels private and very tranquil. 
Belinda was a fantastic host - very welcoming and friendly.
I would highly recommend Bundeena Garden studio to all.
A great stay, in a beautiful part of the world! Thanks so much for your hospitality Belinda. The studio was perfect, fitted with all the mod-cons to make for a comfortable stay.

Belinda is SUPER! She's kind, lovely and, for sure, a SUPER HOST. She did everything for us to feel at home. The studio is super clean, the bed is soft and the trees around made us feel comfortable and in peace.

There are some stairs in the backyard in your way to the house, so consider that if you are bringing many bags to carry.

We spent 3 days with her and had a great time in Bundenna. The beaches are THE BEST! If you like flat beaches, you will love it. Ask for the Ferry beach and Wattamolla. Super!

Well, super guest Belinda, amazing place to stay.. We strongly recomend it :) Thanks, thanks, thanks!
This place was a perfect getaway for us (two adults). I liked the lightness and space in this apartment and Belinda welcomed us warmly. I would go back to stay here again!

We had a lovely stay!! and were pleasantly surprised to find that the studio was just as well presented and cleanly kept as in the photos. Belinda was incredibly welcoming on arrival and very respectful of our privacy during our stay.

From the moment we put down our luggage we felt at home and relaxed. The garden flat has everything you need and a lovely deck on which to sip a wine at the end of a day at the beach. The location is perfect, just a stone's throw from a number of beaches and an easy walk to the ferry. We didn't use our car at all. Belinda provided all the information and communication required in a friendly and discrete manner. We will be back!! Thank you!

Belinda was very welcoming , directions to the unit and check in was very easy. Situated in a quiet street with parking at the door,the apartment is behind her home but at the same time very private with its own entrance and in a separate building. It is light, airy, spotless and well equipped. Belinda has thought of all the little touches and comforts which give the unit a welcoming feel and make for  a very comfortable stay. We had an enjoyable two nights which we would be  happy to repeat.

The garden studio was the perfect spot to enjoy a weekend for two in Bundeena. Beautifully appointed, with many much appreciated extras, and a very helpful but unobtrusive host I couldn't speak too highly of it. I'm sure we'll be back.

We had a lovely stay. The Studio is private and has good amenities. Belinda greeted us on arrival and was very friendly and helpful, and the Bundeena area is beautiful. We were there for a family function, but there is plenty to do close by if you're just holidaying.

This was our first stay with Airbnb and we could not have been happier. Belinda was an excellent host, her garden studio is just as it looks in the photo, spotlessly clean and we especially loved sitting on the verandah soaking up the peace and quiet. Belinda was kind enough to pick us up at the ferry when it was raining on our arrival and had even provided milk in the fridge, tea, salt, pepper etc. Her thoughtfulness was most appreciated. Thanks Belinda, you have set the bar very high for our future Airbnb stays.

The Studio was a lovely place for a weekend for my husband and I to get to know Bundeena. Well appointed, comfortable with a nice beach house decor. Quite private for a backyard studio - we only met the host when picking up and dropping off key - there is a separate entryway and the leafy garden outlook meant it was well screened from the main house. The only sounds were the birds and occasional possum. We enjoyed the breezy verandah which kept us cool on a very warm weekend. Very well located - walking distance to all the best beach spots, walking tracks, shops and ferry. Loved it.

We had an amazing time in this lovely studio!
2 min walk from the beach, 
the studio got a lot of charm with white ceiling an lots of light and peaceful garden around it.

I will be back!
We had a great time at Belinda's place. She made us feel comfortable like we were at home. The studio is beautiful and clean. We hope to come back one day :)

I'm so glad I booked this beautiful studio. It was clean, well stocked and quiet. Belinda's attention to detail was apparent as she supplies the studio with everything you'll need, with a nice collection of books, movies and music for you to enjoy, and even sensor lights that make sure you don't trip on a stone at night.

The studio is also a short walk to several beautiful beaches as well as the neighbourhood supermarket.

If you're going to Bundeena, this is the place to stay.
Belinda made us feel vey welcome and informed us of everything we needed to know about the place. Description of the studio was spot on and would recommend others to stay there.

The studio was immaculate and a nice sanctuary to come back to after  a long bush walk.
Belinda was very friendly and helpful in checking us in, making sure we had everything we needed.
It was great only being minutes to the beach, and a stroll to the main shops. 
Would definitely recommend.

Our stay in Belinda's cottage was lovely. The cottage is clean and tidy and beautifully furnished. It was a short walk into Bundeena town and close to access to the beautiful national park. Our host was friendly and welcoming. Thank you!

It was our second visit to the Bundeena Garden Studio.  Again we were made to feel very welcome and again we found the accommodation perfect for us.  The studio is very private, comfortable, and well equipped and is very handy to the beaches and the Royal National Park.

This was a return visit as I loved staying at the Studio a few months ago. An excellent place to stay in Bundeena as it has a great location, ambience, amenities, privacy - all at a very reasonable rate. The hosts are very considerate.

Chris greeted us on arrival, no probs finding the place. Great drive to Bundeena, cottage is in a top spot close to everything. Belinda has made the cottage inside near perfect, 99/100. Everything is as it should be, comfortable, cosy, clean, private, just lovely, good supply of the essentials including some food items. We loved the organised disorder  of the gardens with all the eclectic bits and piece. Also the birds and possums did not disappoint. Lovely ferry ride to Cronulla. We highly recommend Belindas cottage for a relaxing stay. Cheers Alf & Polly.

Perfect place to explore Bundeena! Belinda met us on arrival to give us the run down of the place, which was  pleasant, private and fully equipped for a weekend away. Minutes walk from the beach, we were able to easily explore the aboriginal rock carvings. The local IGA was open till 8pm every night for our food needs too.

Belinda and Chris have been wonderful hosts! 
We loved our stay at their garden studio. They  thought of everything for our comfort and relaxation even though the temperate outside dropped to 6 degrees we were very comfortable. The location is also excellent being right within Royal National park with magnificent bush walks at your doorstep, thank you very much for having us,
We had a lovely stay at Belind's place in Bundeena. The studio was beautiful, immaculate and in a great location. We'll definitely be back!

I spent a lovely weekend in this cute little fully self contained apartment. Belinda has though of all the little things that make your stay amazing. It close to the shops and the beach. There are some amazing nature walks and mountain bike trails in the area. 
Really good value and i would recommend this little gem to anyone...
Felt very welcome and Belinda accommodated both my late arrival and (slightly) late departure! The description is spot on and a lovely quiet spot in Bundeena...

Perfect getaway weekend! Bundeena is a lovely place and Belinda's cabine is very well located, comfortable and clean! She gave us all the tips we needed to fully enjoy our stay - we'll definitely be back soon!!

We had a lovely time staying at Belinda's garden studio. The studio is lovely and cosy, and very peaceful. The location was great too, as right near the ocean, start of a great walk through the national park and not far to the shops. We would highly recommend staying here if you love walking and would like a great place to relax after.

This was a great stay! The place exceeded my expectations and is definitely better then the pictures. Belinda and Chris were very friendly. The location is right by the water and there are so many great walking tracks nearby. I would definitely stay again

Great place to stay.  Belinda made us feel welcome and was really helpful. Studio was clean, cosy and well equipped. Nice and close to the beach. Great place for a chilled weekend away! Would stay again. Thanks Belinda!

Belinda's place was perfect for a getaway in  Bundeena. The guesthouse is tucked away in a beautiful, lush garden. It is superbly equipped with everything you will ever need and is impeccably clean and very tastefully decorated. Located a short walk from the ferry and close to the beginning of the Coastal walk through the National Park, the location is perfect. The local IGA supermarket is close by and has everything you may need if you want to cook! 
Belinda was very friendly and informative.
Highly recommended!
Belinda was very accommodating and it was a nice relaxed spot!
Great host, showednusbaround when we got there and was very respectful of our privacy during the weekend.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the Bundeena Garden Studio, which is located in a lovely garden at the rear of the main house.  
Our host Belinda met us on arrival and farewelled us.  She was friendly, welcoming and informative; there for us when we needed her but  never intrusive.  
The studio is completely private and is light, spacious and well laid out.  There are many good books, games and DVDs to choose from.  The kitchen has been thoughtfully stocked with a good range of cooking and eating utensils.  The bed and pillows are very comfortable and the bathroom is a good size.  And the whole studio is very clean - we greatly appreciated this thank you Belinda!
During our stay the spring weather changed from balmy to cold and rainy.  The studio was warm, dry and cosy.
Bundeena, with its beaches and surrounding National Park provide wonderful places to explore - we loved walking around the area.  
We thoroughly recommend the Bundeena Studio and Belinda.

Had an excellent weekend in Belinda's garden studio. The room is very cosy and clean and Belinda has cleary gone to great length to ensure that all the little things you'd want are there. I hope to stay here again.

Excellent! Spotless private studio at the back of Belinda's garden. Well maintained and thoughtfully equipped. Great location for beaches, ferry and National Park walks. 
Bundeena is a delightful ' hidden' treasure. 
Belinda was friendly but unobtrusive . Thoroughly recommended

We had a lovely stay at Belinda's place in Bundeena. She even assisted us prior to our trip with some helpful info regarding some walks around the Royal National Park. This is a lovely spot to say; super close to the beach, many walks & sights within the Royal National Park - would definitely love to stay here again.

My girlfriend and I had a delightful stay with Belinda, the place was in a quiet and relaxing location with perfect access to a nice quiet beach for some snorkelling. The property was well equipped (we made great use of the extensive kitchen utensils as there was few eating out options in the town) and beautifully laid out - the photos on the walls were stunning. The veranda was a nice place to sit and chill out and was nicely enclosed by the garden so it was peaceful and nicely separated from the house. Belinda was very welcoming and accommodating.

We had such a wonderful time at Bundeena Garden Studio. Belinda made everything so easy for us; she was incredibly accommodating.

The studio itself is fantastic. It's clean, comfortable and beautifully designed (Belinda's artwork hangs on the walls). Literally moments from the beach and a short walk to the shops. 

I can't recommend this accommodation enough! We will definitely be visiting again.
Very cute eclectic flat! We had clean sheets, absolutely perfect water pressure in the shower

We were made welcome from the start. Very friendly and told us all we needed to know without being intrusive.
The accommodation was exactly as described and very restful and surrounded by nature. We had a very comfortable stay and Belinda was very understanding at a difficult time for us (attending a parent's funeral). 
Nothing could have been improved from our point of view and we hope we can go back again on our next trip to Sydney and spend more time exploring the wonderful Bundeena and the Royal National Park. Thank you Belinda and Chris, you really were great hosts.
 PS - we loved the book about Sydney's Southern Beaches - The Saltwater People, it gave us a real insight into the Indigenous history of the area and a look at its interesting European history. A perfect book for visitors to read/see. Thanks also for having the basics on hand in the fridge and cupboard- with a late arrival by plane that made the first morning easier.
Best regards for the future
Rachael and Mark

A beautiful peaceful garden studio with everything required for a relaxing weekend away. Some captivating pieces of artwork and a great selection of books and music. Belinda was very helpful and accommodating, a great host.

I felt so lucky to have been able to stay at this wonderful place.  In an incredible little corner of the world, this calming and well-appointed space was the perfect HQ for a few days of exploring the stunning Australian coast.  Belinda was a gracious and accommodating host, and I appreciate the great taste with which she fashioned this simple studio.

We had an incredible time at Belinda's. After a week in Sydney, and coming from New York City, a few days at her quiet, peaceful studio in Bundeena surrounded by the Royal National Park was all I could ask for. I wish I could have stayed longer. The studio is behind her house in a lush garden, perfectly furnished and clean. Belinda let us have our space and at the same time was very helpful, giving my friend a ride to the ferry and providing tips on Bundeena. 
All you hear are birds, the wind through the trees and the ocean a couple blocks away. The National Park is around a corner and you're at the north tip of the beautiful coastal walk, which if you did it in its entirety would take two full days, requiring camping. We only walked as far as Little Marley Beach. Perhaps if I returned I would have rented a car one day so that I could have seen more of the southern coast of the park.
Thank you Belinda! I hope to return.

Belinda was warm and helpful and made my stay very easy. The description details were accurate. It was a lovely idyllic setting in the garden with a side entrance for guests. I loved everything about the place. The studio was decorated in a soothing and artistic way with Belinda's beautiful art works and tasteful furniture and other touches.   I felt like I was in a perfect forest retreat. At night I could hear frogs and crickets and then morning birds and it was lovely to sit on the verandah with tea and walk down to Jibbon Beach nearby. Simply a lovely break. Thank you!

Belinda's studio was an absolutely perfect and idyllic place to stay,  and everything is as described in the listing. I stayed here on my own as a retreat to do some writing, and after setting up myself with some groceries, I had everything that I needed in the studio, down to the simplest essentials for cooking. The studio is spacious enough to feel like a home, yet intimate enough to feel like a real beachside getaway shack. With beautiful Jibbon Beach and a bushwalk just minutes away, it was easy to get a nature hit everyday after a writing session in the studio.

Belinda was also a very welcoming host, who even offered to pick me up from the supermarket after the weather turned nasty. After setting me up at the start, Belinda and her husband were also respectful of my privacy as I worked, and even though the studio is in the backyard behind their house, I didn't hear a peep. But Belinda was very responsive to my text messages if I needed anything.

Would definitely recommend this place for a really comfortable and really reasonably priced getaway, solo or as a couple (my girlfriend visited for an evening and we enjoyed the surrounding beach and bush). Thanks Belinda!
Wonderful studio in a great location, everything you need inside. Very comfortable bed & lovely and quiet. Key exchange was easy and Belinda was a great host with good communication.

Belinda was a perfect host, she was welcoming and gave us a run down of the place as soon as we arrived, we were half hr earlier than expected and she still accommodated for us which was great. Neighborhood is relaxing, quiet. It was raining pretty much the whole time we were there but there was plenty to offer to pass time - good reads, music, games. The studio had everything we needed, the quality of linen and towels was 5 star. Thanks for a great stay! Highly recommended!

This was a great place to stay. Private, quiet, roomy. Close to beaches and ferry. The veranda was a great bonus in the heavy rain. Thank you for meeting us with a brolly Belinda and for the fresh milk and coffee. A lovely stay.

We stayed here for three nights as we travelled along the NSW coast.   Belinda and Chris were both helpful and hospitable. 

The studio was comfortable, well-equipped and clean, with a nice covered veranda in the secluded garden.  

It was also just a few minutes walk to the pretty and quiet Jibbon Beach and a short drive to the shops in Bundeena itself.  The more popular beaches at Wattamolla and Garrie are about 20-30 minutes drive away. 

Thanks for allowing us to stay in your place.  We would be very happy to stay there again if we make a return trip. 
Ken and Rosemary
Great place to stay. Very relaxed and easy to get too from Sydney. Belinda was a great host and very welcoming. We had a fantastic time and would recommend Belinda to anyone.

Belinda's place was perfect for a weekend escape! The apartment is extremely well equip with everything you would need. Belinda was a great host explaining the local walks and beautiful places to visit.
We look forward to visiting again!

This is such a perfect getaway spot. Belinda was very welcoming, and also very discreet while we were there. The studio is so thoughtfully put together, not cluttered but with everything you need- especially in the kitchen! Nicely curated selection of CDs, DVDs & books, and the artworks, timber furniture & decorations make the whole space feel very calming. And we loved being so close to the beach, town and bush walks.
A beautiful tranquil garden cottage provided for a very relaxing weekend
This was our 2nd time staying at this great property.  It has everything you need to relax and unwind. Beaches just there,  beautiful tropical surroundings and friendly hosts!

Belinda was very welcoming and friendly. She's lovely to chat to and pick up some suggestion for the local area. The studio is bright, fresh and has a pretty green outlook into the garden. A minute walk to the beach - you can't ask for a better location in Bundeena. We will be recommending to our friends
This was a perfect getaway from the city.  A beautiful little apartment with the comfiest bed and best shower ever! I will be going back :)

We had an amazing time in Belinda's garden studio. The location is perfect, the studio is clean, modern, and charming with everything you could need. Belinda was a very accommodating as a host. Can't recommend enough!

Bundeena Garden Studio is as per images and description. It is clean and tidy with added extras in the pantry for your convenience should you require them, as well as fresh milk in the fridge. Belinda is warm and efficient informing us of the possibility of earlier check in when accommodation was ready. The environment felt private nestled down the back of the property. The native birds where a lovely addition to the morning coffee on the verandah. We had a lovely time at the beach all day and then being able to walk back to our comfortable home away from home made for a great break. Thanks Belinda we would like to return again.

Everything was as pictured and explained. The beaches, shops and cafes are all within walking distance so we didn't need to move the car at all. Check in/out was easy and Belinda is super accommodating and genuinely lovely. The cooking facilities were handy, we took pre prepared meals and 'zapped' them but also made popcorn in the electric frypan and Bbq'd too. We loved that there was some DVD's and books and games.

Belinda is a friendly and accommodating host, and helped make our stay perfect. The cabin is set in a beautiful garden, which made for a very relaxing setting. The cabin had everything we wanted, right down to the chess set, and a few types of tea on offer. And only a minute walk from the beach. Lovely.

Belinda was very welcoming.
The Garden Studio is very quiet and private in a lovely neighbourhood.

Our stay was exactly what we were looking for. The location was perfect, only a short drive to the national park and an even shorter walk to the beach. Belinda was very accommodating, providing us with information about the features of the studio as well as surrounding food and activities. The studio had everything we needed including a fully equipped kitchen and barbecue. The studio was quiet and peaceful, the perfect place to relax. We would love to stay again and will definitely recommend to friends.
An amazing location with beautifully furnished clean living area. Big, well equipped kitchen and clean bathroom. Will be definitely coming  back!

Belinda is great , friendly host, she saved our lives with her supplies 
( as IGA was closed on Good Friday).The accommodation is lovely, private and has everything what you may need. We really enjoyed our stay in Garden Studio and hope to be back! Thank you! Ula & Pete

Belinda and her husband were both very kind and helpful, they were informative but gave us space and privacy too. The property was clean, well equipped with quality towels and linen, kitchen had everything we needed (BBQ was great) and had a nice little supply of pantry items. It was perfect for a relaxing getaway! Had a fantastic time many thanks :)
I found Belinda's studio a delightful place for my weekend retreat.  It is quiet, comfortable and attractive.  Great access to beautiful beaches and the Royal National Park.

An absolute gem of a place. Immaculate, lovely location, everything provided that you could possibly need. Belinda was easy to deal with, efficient and friendly. This weekend idyll was everything I hoped it would be and more. Peaceful, easy to arrange, gorgeous location, beautiful accommodation, friendly hosts. Can't wait to book again!
Brilliant location and perfect little getaway : )

Amazing Space.. Definitely going back soon.. Belinda was the greatest.. she walked me back and showed me everything I needed for a great stay .. she was also a text away all weekend whenever I ran into a hitch... the space is beautiful and just perfect for getting into the beaches, national park and the slower pace of bundeena...

Right from when I put in the request for a booking Belinda responded straight away and was constantly in touch with me to provide detailed information about our visit. The studio was very clean and comfortable, and every detail had been thought of, which made our visit very easy and relaxing. Perfect size for a couple!
The location of the studio was perfect for us too, a couple of minutes walk to a beautiful beach and close to the entry into the National Park, yet really peaceful.
We really enjoyed our weekend away, and would highly recommend the studio for a peaceful and relaxing getaway.

Belinda's place is exactly as in the photos, modern, clean, comfy and with all the necessary items for our stay. The kitchen was well equiped and easy to use. The neighbourhood is really nice and quiet, and the walk to the beach was really quick. Belinda was a very good host helping us with every detail we asked, including cafes, grocery shops, stores, even the ferry to cronulla, etc, etc, are all really close (walking distance). Overall the place and the host were amazing, me and my husband would definitely recommend them. Thank you Belinda!

Belinda & Chris were amazing hosts who were quick to respond to questions: provided much privacy; and were lovely enough to allow a late check out. Belinda has great attention to detail and a creative talent shown through the decor of her spacey studio. It felt more like a quaint cottage with a self-sufficient kitchen and patio, where we spent much of our time relaxing.  Their place is surrounded by beautiful plants and trees, and their location is so close to all the beaches and walking trails.  Thank you Belinda and Chris for a lovely stay! We will definitely be back soon :)

Settling back into home and work after a perfect long weekend in Bundeena, I'm already planning a return trip. We'd like to thank Belinda for creating a beautiful self-contained studio space where we were able to relax, surrounded by a leafy garden. We felt immediately at home and had everything we needed to prepare and eat all of our meals there; and after exploring the surrounds during the days we were very happy to relax indoors in the evenings, listening to music and reading. The position of the studio is perfect, only a few minutes in either direction for a waterfront walk and to the local cafes and well-stocked IGA. We were fortunate for a late cancellation that we were able to book in last minute to the garden studio, but will be booking further in advance next trip to ensure availability in Belinda's garden studio.

Great cabin for exploring Bundeena and the surrounding walks. 

The cabin is in the back of Belinda's property. It's private and has a useful kitchen.

Belinda provided the information we needed about traveling to Bundeena.

Thank you Belinda and Chris for making your beautiful garden studio available for stays. Divine! We had a fabulous time. The studio had everything we needed, great kitchen set up so we could prepare two yummy simple meals, and a lovely little verandah into the garden to enjoy our leisurely breakfasts. Your studio in located only a minutes walk to the best little beach and so close to stunning cliff tops walks in the Royal Nat Park. We had absolute privacy for out stay - which was lovely. Thank you for such a welcoming, private and cosy sanctuary.

Had an amazing time at this beautiful little studio. Belinda and Chris were really helpful, which made for an easy check in and a great weekend away. Would defiantly recommend it to anyone visiting the area.

The studio is great! Belinda was not home when I stayed, but my partner and I were welcomed by her husband Chris.  He was also kind enough to drop us near the ferry on a rainy day when we departed, as we were bogged down by luggage.

The garden is in a serene location with a lovely view of a garden.  Plenty of subtropical birds can be heard which adds to the ambiance.  Along with the tranquility of the studio itself, my favourite part was the walking distance to nearby beaches and Royal National Park.  Both of us ended up at the beach during the morning, day and night!  All in all, the stay was well worth every penny.

I love this little sanctuary. This was my second stay and it was just as lovely as the first. Belinda is a friendly and gracious host - easy communication, lovely welcome. The garden studio is delightful - immaculate and beautifully and comfortably furnished, it has everything you could need. Love sitting on the little deck with my book and a glass of wine! 
Great location close to beaches and bush walks. Peaceful, private, secure.

Belinda & Chris were very welcoming & informative about the area & amenities...
We felt very secluded & totally enjoyed our stay. We will be back!!!!

Our hosts were welcoming and friendly and their studio was clean and comfortable with plenty of quality furnishing, fittings and accessories throughout. Bundeena Garden Studio has everything a couple could need including good literature, music and movies for the evening, - or a rainy day.

Thanks Belinda for welcoming us to your beautiful Garden Studio.  We were also very greatful with your flexibility in changing the night for us as per our request.  The studio was well appointed with a great kitchen which had everything that I required to cook our meals etc.  Shower was also great.  Very close to beach and amenities.  Bundeena is lovely place to visit and Belinda's studio is a perfect place for a couple.
Everything was perfect

We were so pleased with the clean, up to date furnishings and equipment. More spacious than the photos looked. Everything was well thought out,  including cooking utensils and basics like milk, oil, coffee etc. Lovely location near multiple beaches and short walk to town. We enjoyed the DVD collection and sound system when the weather turned against us.  Belinda gave us a very warm, informative welcome then left us to our privacy. Enjoyed the many birds and possums and feeling like we were in the bush but in the comfort of a lovely home.
Everything we expected, beautiful location! Great host! Would recommend for anyone looking for a quiet escape from busy Sydney city! Perfect stay for our first airbnb!

Our stay here was so lovely. We will definitely be back! Private, clean, sunny, well equipped, homely and an ideal location to explore the national park. Belinda welcomed us and showed us the ropes and some good walks   We will definitely be back!! Thank you!

My girlfriend and I spent a lovely few days at the Studio down in Bundeena! We stayed in the cabin as a refreshing getaway, and it lived up to all of our hopes. The location is fantastic - within walking distance from the start of the coastal track in the Royal National Park and just one minute walk from a great beach to watch the sunset at. The cabin is very well equipped - we cooked all of our meals there, it's very warm, the bed is very comfortable, and it's very tastefully decorated. Chris and Belinda were also very helpful during our stay and they responded speedily to all of our communications.

Over all, it was a fantastic trip and we would definitely book again!
Belinda's garden studio is a great getaway. The place was tidy, clean and good value. I have nothing bad to write and can only recommend to stay here.

I really enjoyed my few days stay here, recovering from jet lag so I could start work refreshed and ready to go. I was made very welcome and had everything I needed in the studio. 
The bit I enjoyed most was sitting out on the deck at night on the warm evenings listening to the 'strange' wildlife. 
The beaches are a couple of minutes in either direction and local amenities a 5 minute walk.
Hard to believe I was only an hour away from Sydney airport, it seemed a million miles away.
Beautiful location, so close to beaches and the National Park. Great little studio with everything you need.
We loved our stay at Belinda's beautiful beach cottage. We have stayed before and will definitely stay again :) Thank you.

The true luxury if you are looking for peacefulness, romantic escapade, amazing walks, l
Simplicity with elegance describe the hidden paradise of Belinda
Thank you

What a lovely place this is. Belinda has thought of everything - the stuio was amazingly well equipped, as well as being spotlessly clean. The location was also great being easy walking distance to shops, cafes, beaches and the ferry. Highly recommended!
We had a wonderful stay and will hopefully be back soon.
We had a lovely Christmas here - everything was perfect and the beaches were all extremely closeby! Thank you!
This place is a amazing. Perfect location, great host and a truly peaceful getaway.

Sehr freundlicher Empfang mit einer super Einweisung in die Unterkunft. Mit weiteren Infos zu den direkten Örtlichkeiten, Stränden, öffentliche Verkehrsanbindung (Schiffsfähre) und den Sehenswürdigkeiten des wunderschönen Naturparks. 
Das eigenständige absolut ruhig gelegene Appartementhaus entsprach meiner Meinung nach zu 100% der Gastgeberbeschreibung und ist modern mit guter technischer und wohnlicher Ausstattung versehen. 
Es war sogar möglich kurzzeitig eine 3. Person in Abstimmung mit der Gastgeberin übernachten zu lassen. Insgesamt betrachtet war der Urlaubsaufenthalt hier einzigartig, in einem liebevoll ausgestattetem Ambiente inmitten von grüner Natur und Stränden.

I looooved staying at this studio. It was so peaceful, in a perfect location and well appointed with everything you need. This is now my preferred 'escape hatch' from the city. I can't wait to go back.

A great place to stay and enjoy the beaches and walks available in the Royal National Park. Its private and stylish with easy access to the local beaches and within walking distance to local shops and super market. Highly recommended.
Belinda has created a wonderful cottage.  Very neat, comfortable, and well equiped.

Fantastic.  The accommodation was very comfortable,  clean, well decorated and a well stocked kitchen. Close to the beach and shops.  We were made to feel very welcome and Belinda is a great host.  We will be back.
Wonderful stay!! Belinda was really nice and helpful with suggestions. The house is spacious and well equipped. We highly recommend this place!

Another great stay in Bundeena at Belinda's! You can park the car or arrive off the ferry and then walk to everything you need. It is a gentle, beautiful and relaxing place to stay and we'll certainly be back, yet again. Thank you, Belinda.
Was exactly as described. Fantastic place and would stay again.
Hosts were great and cabin was very clean and well equipped. Very comfortable stay

Belinda's stay was immaculate and she really has thought about all the details! Location is great, within walking distance to trails and local amenities, with being peaceful and pleasant at the same time.

Wonderful place in Bundeena, 1 to 2 minutes to stunning beaches. Cute apartment with a lot of nice details. You find everything you need to make yourself at home. Belinda is a perfect host and gives you lots of great advices for your time in the National Park. Wish we could have stayed longer... had such a relaxed time.
Nice cute place

Great cozy cottage stay! The studio is within a garden which gives a great leafy outlook. Belinda was a very welcoming host. We took her recommendations and went on a beautiful coastal walk- within the Royal National Park. The studio is also walking distance from the beach and the Cronulla ferry.
All in all it was a great get-away!

We had a wonderful stay. It was quiet, relaxing and very comfortable. Belinda and Chris are great hosts. The cabin is set in leafy garden minutes from the beach and it has a private entrance. The kitchen is well-equipped.

Way better than the photos! So clean and well decorated. We wanted to stay a lot longer. Belinda is lovely. The linen was top quality and everything was immaculate. There was even ground coffee and a plunger. Lovely garden. We did get woken up a bit by possums galloping on the roof but that's hard to control this close to. National park!
We walked 11km to Wattamalla beach and back again, and saw Wedding Cake rock and fish jumping at the beach. Also the IGA sells liquor and isn't far away.
Cosy studio exactly as described, perfectly located near the beach and national park. Belinda was extremely helpful and kind. Loved the stay!

Tucked away in a secluded spot in Belinda's garden, this cute, (immaculately) clean and cosy cottage was just perfect for our few days away in Bundeena. It felt very private with lots of little touches that made it very comfortable. It was a great find and an enjoyable few days.

Absolutely loved the stay here!  Bundeena is a corner of paradise, and this studio is the ideal location to stay in Bundeena.  Just a short walk to the gorgeous beach and entrance to Royal National Park at Jibbons Beach - bushwalking galore!  My partner and I hiked from morning to night our entire time staying there, and the studio was the perfect place to return to for cosy comfort.  The local restaurants and IGA are also a simple 10 minute walk from the studio, making grocery shopping and food outings easy with a scenic walk.

Belinda was ever helpful, even after leaving for an out of town trip.  Her husband, Chris, was also attentive and kind.  The studio itself has all the needed amenities, being very clean and feeling comfortable and spacious.  It is privately tucked away in the back of Belinda's property.  All in all I highly recommend and hope to come again.

Lovely little secluded cottage well worth a weekend away at this destination.

Can't fault it.

Belinda did not disappoint...Bundeena a snails pace away from the more raving Cronulla. Stay and renergise as you explore Jibbon and the National Park. It is  a secluded little garden paradise and as restful as you wish to make it. Perfect for a getaway.

Belinda's little cottage was very cute and comfortable. 

For those spending the day out walking/going to the beach it's a great choice. 

The cottage is at the back of Belinda's house, which was clear on the listing, but might not be ideal for those wanting a place of their own.

A lovely cottage that feels a world away from Sydney although only an hour out of town. Short walk to both the beach and cafes / shops of Bundeena and perfect for exploring the Royal National Park. We stayed during winter so were grateful for the heater and electric blankets. Would definitely recommend.

The Cabin is located in a handy location and is a very spacious, comfortable and clean. Set in a beautiful private garden and only a short walk to the village centre and beaches. Belinda is a very amicable and accommodating host. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again.
Always a great experience.  Excellent amenities and location.
Nice place

Belinda and her husband have veen a wonderful host! Studio is located near the wharf and a walkable distance to IGA. The studio is exceptionally clean and the kitchen is fully equipped. The toilet looks newly renovated and the view from the garden is absolutely breathtaking. We will definitely come again!

Belinda’s cabin was beautifully decorated, well equipped and a much larger space than we expected. We particularly appreciated the deck and leafy outlook, as well as the proximity to Jibbon Beach. It was an easy walk down to the local shops to pick up supplies. Belinda was also incredibly welcoming and flexible. Thank you Belinda! We definitely hope to visit again!

An incredible stay at this warm, cottage with excellent facilities! I recommend Belinda's hospitality highly. She provided us with comprehensive information of the local region. The decor of the space was very comfortable; a wonderful get-away!

Belinda's place was a fantastic self-contained unit, with the perfect location in Bundeena to explore the surrounding national parks. Belinda was able to provide great local knowledge to set us upon our adventures in Bundeena.
Tyst och lugnt och nära till vandringsleder och strand. Fint hus och fantastisk trädgård.

Belinda's cabin is very clean and comfortable, and spacious for two. The sun hits the porch in the morning so it's the perfect spot for a quiet coffee to start the day. Super close to beautiful Jibbon beach but everything in town is within walking distance anyway. We would definitely recommend.

Je recommande vivement ce logement magnifiquement bien situé à proximité du Royal National Park, confortable et décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Les œuvres d’art de Belinda nous ont donné matière à réflexion tout le long du séjour ! Parfait également au niveau des équipements, et Belinda nous a donné toutes les informations pour que notre  séjour se passe au mieux.

Perfect location, close enough to walk into town and to walk to the start of the National Park trails. Two beaches right across the road, perfect for sunset and swimming. The cottage had everything we needed and was very clean and tidy. Belinda was a wonderful host

Garten und Einrichtung mit künstlerischem Flair, sehr sauber und ruhig, Holzterasse umgeben von üppigen Pflanzen, guter Ausgagspunkt für Wanderungen,  5 Min. zum Strand
Es war sehr erholsam,  wir haben den Aufenthalt genossen.

The garden studio gave us the escape we needed for our first anniversary getaway. Offering self contained comfort with calm, beautiful beaches and shops/cafes a stroll away and nearby the Coastal Walk with its dramatic cliff edges and seascapes, it would be challenging to find a more well situated spot. Highly recommended for a few days away.
Such a delightful studio close to the beach we thoroughly enjoyed the space, the location and the peaceful surroundings x

Had a great time, close to beach 
Loved it
A beautiful space set in a tranquil garden. Well appointed and very clean, perfect for an escape from the big smoke to relax at the beach. Great host, easy to deal with and very accomodating.

Wow just what the doctor ordered. EVERY tiny thing you needed was there from coffe, milk, appliances, crockery, cutlery, vegemite even tinned tomatoes, shower gel, etc. VERY COOL DVDS, classy chess set, glad wrap salt pepper maps - you name it. All new. All fresh. All those things you hate having to buy at every hotel stay - you dont need to here. Most of all absolute Zen atmosphere. Beautiful, restful location. IGA had anything else you may need. Exemplary communication  cant wait to come back. So grateful to our amazingly accommodating but discreet hosts. Mwah!

A perfect location to enjoy everything Bundeena has to offer. The cottage was private, quiet and with a lovely aspect over the garden which can be enjoyed from the deck. We strongly agree with an earlier comment the cottage is very comfortable and well equipped with books, cds and dvds.

We stayed for 4 dayds over Christmas and found it very relaxing and plan to return.
This was a fun and relaxing stay. The place was lovely, clean, and very conveniently located. The hosts were friendly and knowledgeable of the local area.

I have to say this place was one hidden gem !! 

Great location and 2 min walk to Jibbon beach which is a beautiful calm beach good for swimming . 

10 min walk to shops which was convenient and had IGA, bakery, take away shops , cafes and liquor store !!!!!! 

Great hosts and great little set up with the bbq and cosy place ! 

My partner and I will definitely be back before summers over!!!!

We had a great relaxing Nye weekend here. I definitely recommend it if your looking for a nice private weekend away with peace / quiet and great location next to the beach. 

Thank you Belinda for letting us stay in your beautiful home and looking after us well :)) 

We will be back soon

A peaceful stay in a well equipped garden studio - steps away from Bundeena beautiful beaches and nature walks. Belinda and Chris are hospitable and responsive hosts. We thank them for a peaceful rest in Bundeena
We are regulars and it is always a treat.
It’s an amazing place to stay at Bundeena, very cozy, clean and extremely close to beaches

Belinda's place is amazing for staying in Bundeena. Not only the garden studio itself is very cozy and comfortable, but the location is also great. It's very close to Jibbon beach and coast walk. It's very quiet and peaceful.

Private bush garden setting, perfume of frangipani, easy walk to a swim, or a coffee shop.
Fun to arrive by train and ferry.
We are regulars.  Always a great time.
Beautiful location, clean and very comfortable. Recommended.
Amazing beaches all nearby. Shops walking distance

We had a wonderful stay at Belinda's in Bundeena. The bungalow was very comfortable with great amenities. A compact yet complete kitchen, comfortable bed, clean bathroom etc. Proximity to the beaches and walking tracks in the national park made it an idyllic weekend getaway! We would highly recommend. Thanks again Belinda.
Very private accommodation in a great location. Lovely hosts to deal with. Would definitely return.
Great place, lovely location, super stay ... We really do recommend both Bundeena and Belinda's place to visit. We had a great time.
Another great stay
What a fantastic little slice of paradise.  Gorgeous accommodation, spotlessly clean, calm environment and literally just a stones throw from the most stunning beaches ever.
We had a great time and thanks for your advices Belinda. Very friendly host in a pretty place. Perfect localisation to enjoy sunset and the royal nationnal park !

Le studio est spacieux, bien agencé et très lumineux, bien placé à côté de jolies balades et de plages parfaites pour les couchers de soleil. Bucolique c’est un lieu idéal pour un séjour calme proche de la nature !

The most perfect cottage! I needed somewhere quiet to do some exam study, and Belinda and Chris's place was the perfect hideaway amid lush monsteras (while being close to the ferry and shops!). It's so lovely being able to wake up and stumble into Royal National Park – a five-minute walk down the road. The space itself is tastefully decorated, private and cosy with a well-equipped kitchen. I would love to visit again! Thanks so much.
Great little place, very close to the track and beaches. Definitely recommend it.

Very clean and good place for rest
Near the beach just 1min and 3mins to the supermarket and everything is good 
Very Kind host!!!!
We had great time
Homely place with everything you need and in a great location. We'll be back

This was our second visit to the cabin but the first with our new baby! We hope to keep coming back to this lovely space with all the conveniences you could want in a great location near the beach yet a short walk to the village shops.
Perfect spot for a getaway. Wouldn't stay elsewhere in Bundeena.

We had a fabulous stay here for two nights, but could easily stay more. The accomodation is very well appointed with everything you need. If you want to cook and eat-in, the kitchen had everything. But Bundeena shops and restaurants are only a few minutes walk. The studio is in a secluded private location. We would happily stay here again.
Great little granny flat, nice and private, you feel like your just in a little forest

Thank you so much Belinda for the stay in your lovely cottage. The space is perfect - clean, modern design, peppered with lovely vintage touches. We loved looking out the windows onto your lush garden and it was a treat to be so close to such a stunning beach. It's the ideal home base for exploring the Royal National Park. Hope to be back again!

Clean, private, comfortable - everything we needed. The location was beautiful with easy walking access to great beaches and national park trails. Belinda was available if we needed anything, but the cabin was so well set up that we were comfy in a world of our own.

Belinda's place is SPOTLESS - it was seriously one of the cleanest and most comfortable places we've stayed in. The flat is located at the back of a magical garden. We stayed in winter and in addition to heat, there were electric blankets which were so cozy. The location is amazing, just inside the Royal National Park and we found parking on the street, just outside very easily. Belinda was so lovely and nice too! We will definitely be back.

Belinda's place has everything I needed to hide away for a few days - including subtle lighting, heating & cooling options, wine glasses, and music system for cds, iPod, radio, and a gorgeous private balcony looking out onto lush garden. So close to the sea too. I loved it.
Great place for a weekend !

Perfectly situated for chilling out on the beach or exploring the coastal walks. Belinda was a great host and had some great suggestions for things to do locally. The apartment is situated in a lovely garden and only a few minutes walk from the beautiful little Jibbon beach. A perfect spot for a relaxing break.
Belinda's place was in an excellent location, so close to the beach! It was spotless and had everything you need to cook. Really relaxing, perfect for a quiet getaway.

Great stay at Belinda's comfortable and cosy accommodation.   Booking, check in and check out super easy.  Belinda ensures plenty of pre-check in communication and has local information available for you.   Her place is well equipped, in a great location, and provides privacy and serenity.  The garden outlook is very pleasant and relaxing.
Beautiful environment and lovely designed space. Would definitely go again

Fantastic spot in Bundeena, virtually on top of a beach that I’d call paradise. Jibbon and the walks around the heads are magnificent. 
Belinda’s cabin is private even though you’re in her back garden. A very comfortable nook! 
Thanks for accommodating our early bag drop too.
Great spot
Always a great stay.

That this was my third stay at this lovely place should tell you everything you need to know! It is a delightful getaway in a beautiful location. Can't recommend highly enough even if it means booking my fourth stay will probably be harder!
Very nicely decorated and clean cottage in a nice garden close to the beach.

Clean comfortable accommodation. Suitable for couples. 
Bundeena is a beautiful area which you can use as a base for exploring the surrounding 
Royal National Park.

I loved my stay here! The garden around the studio makes it feel secluded and peaceful, and the location is excellent - it's very close to multiple beautiful beaches as well as the coastal track in the Royal National Park. The perfect place to go to escape the city for a few days.

This gorgeous  little cabin is a perfect base for hiking, swimming and relaxing.  Close to shops and ferry, so if you don't drive it's very convenient. I didn't want to leave.  Belinda was an excellent host, attention to detail with the small comforts in the cabin, and great communication. I highly recommend and look forward to another visit there soon.

Belinda was an excellent host who, once she showed us the studio left us to do our own thing. Everything we needed was available in the studio, which was a few minutes walk to beaches, shops and beautiful walks.
Such a lovely few days with Belinda in the beautiful Bundeena - well worth a visit! Everything was perfect, thank you again Belinda, we will definitely be back.
Belinda was a great host. The place is very clean and location is beautiful, peaceful and very convenient.

This was my second time at the cottage and there is so much to love about it.  Generous size space with a lush, green garden and close to all amenities.  You cross the road and the beach is right there, about 3 minutes to the RSL, 6 minutes walk to IGA and 2 minutes from Jibbon Beach from where you can do a walk.  Only 4 minutes drive to Beachcomber Ave from where you can start the Royal National Park coastal walk - a really stunning walk.  And Belinda is, well, just a beautiful human being!  Do yourself a favour and stay here.
Belinda was an amazing host. I loved my stay here :) Located in a beautiful area, close to beaches, shops etc. Would highly recommend staying here.
Very comfortable clean accomodation in a lovely setting
Lovely cabin. Perfect for a weekend escape in a beautiful location. We would definitely go back again.

I had such a wonderful stay at belinda's. The place itself was a tranquil hideaway set within a beautiful garden. 
I was surprised at how private it was,  and I loved how the place was nicely decorated. 
The location was great - only a minute to a quiet beach. 
Belinda was fantastic. Very accommodating and respectful of privacy. 
I would highly recommend this place.
The perfect place if you want to leave the city. On the moment you step on the beautiful old ferry you will have the feeling you are going to an island.
Always a great stay.  Fantastic location and very comfortable.

I would highly recommend staying at Belinda's place. It was only a stone away from the beach and only a couple of minutes by car from the National Park walking tracks. Moreover, Belinda was a great host and provided us with much relevant information regarding the spots to eat, shop in the area and most importantly the must do walks. Furthermore, the cabin was very cozy and well decorated and had everything you needed in order to make your trip unforgettable!

It was wild and wet when I had an escape from the city ... was expecting to swim and walk but the space is so relaxing, and the book shelves full of so many interesting reads that it wasn’t hard to stay in and just wander in the weather breaks! Came by train and ferry- perfect start to a welcome break.
Privacy, comfort & possums.
